name: Oda Clan
startIntroPart1: Lord Oda Nobunaga, Great Daimyō and lord of the Oda clan, our powerful and loyal soldiers are ready for your order! You destroyed the most powerful Ashikaga Clan with ease, and dominated this land! Unlike other foolish daimyō, you imported futuristic technologies from foreign countries, and commissioned a lot to the modernization of Japan!
startIntroPart2: O Great Tenka-bito, Will you rule this land of rising sun, and light up the world with sunlight?
declaringWar: I hereby inform you of our intention to wipe out your civilization from this world.
attacked: Pitiful fool! Now we shall destroy you!
defeated: How is it possible that those Apes hurt us? The galactic senate will take care of them.
introduction: As superior galactic entities, you are not worthy of our attention.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
